properties.areaDesc: Delaware Bay waters south of East Point NJ to Slaughter Beach DE
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 12:44AM EST until January 9 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
choppy waters expected.

* WHERE...Lower Delaware Bay.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 1 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING
